queries.query: INSERT INTO D_M${localChannelId} (ID, SERVER_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, PROCESSED, ORIGINAL_ID, IMPORT_ID, IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO D_MC${localChannelId} (METADATA_ID, MESSAGE_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT, DATA_TYPE, IS_ENCRYPTED) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE D_MC${localChannelId} SET CONTENT = ?, DATA_TYPE = ?, IS_ENCRYPTED = ? WHERE METADATA_ID = ? AND MESSAGE_ID = ? AND CONTENT_TYPE = ?
INSERT INTO D_MA${localChannelId} (ID, MESSAGE_ID, TYPE, SEGMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_SIZE, CONTENT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT ID, sum(ATTACHMENT_SIZE) AS ATTACHMENT_SIZE FROM D_MA${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? GROUP BY ID
SELECT TYPE, SEGMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_SIZE, CONTENT FROM D_MA${localChannelId} WHERE ID = ? ORDER BY SEGMENT_ID ASC
SELECT ID, TYPE, SEGMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_SIZE, CONTENT FROM D_MA${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? ORDER BY ID, SEGMENT_ID ASC

INSERT INTO D_MM${localChannelId} (ID, MESSAGE_ID, SERVER_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, STATUS, CONNECTOR_NAME, SEND_ATTEMPTS, SEND_DATE, RESPONSE_DATE, ERROR_CODE, CHAIN_ID, ORDER_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE D_MM${localChannelId} SET STATUS = ? WHERE ID = ? AND MESSAGE_ID = ? AND SERVER_ID = ?
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = TRUE WHERE ID = ?
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = FALSE, IMPORT_ID = NULL, IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID = NULL WHERE ID = ?
SELECT CHANNEL_ID, LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID FROM D_CHANNELS
SELECT MAX(LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID) FROM D_CHANNELS
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} DROP COLUMN "${columnName}"
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(ID), 0) FROM D_M${localChannelId}
SELECT COALESCE(MIN(ID), 0) FROM D_M${localChannelId}
SELECT MM.STATUS FROM D_M${localChannelId} M JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM ON MM.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID WHERE M.ID = ? AND M.PROCESSED = TRUE
SELECT M.* FROM D_M${localChannelId} M JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM ON MM.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID AND MM.ID = 0 WHERE M.PROCESSED = FALSE AND MM.SERVER_ID = ? AND MM.STATUS != 'R' ORDER BY M.ID

SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} MM JOIN D_M${localChannelId} M ON M.ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM0 ON MM0.MESSAGE_ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID AND MM0.ID = 0 WHERE M.PROCESSED = FALSE AND MM0.SERVER_ID = ? AND MM0.STATUS != 'R' ORDER BY M.ID, MM.ID

SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} MM JOIN D_M${localChannelId} M ON M.ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM0 ON MM0.MESSAGE_ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID AND MM0.ID = 0 WHERE MM.ID = ? AND MM.STATUS = ? AND MM0.SERVER_ID = ? AND MM.SERVER_ID = MM0.SERVER_ID ORDER BY MM.MESSAGE_ID
INSERT INTO D_MS${localChannelId} (METADATA_ID, SERVER_ID, RECEIVED, RECEIVED_LIFETIME, FILTERED, FILTERED_LIFETIME, SENT, SENT_LIFETIME, ERROR, ERROR_LIFETIME) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} SET RECEIVED = RECEIVED + ?, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ?, FILTERED = FILTERED + ?, FILTERED_LIFETIME = FILTERED_LIFETIME + ?, SENT = SENT + ?, SENT_LIFETIME = SENT_LIFETIME + ?, ERROR = ERROR + ?, ERROR_LIFETIME = ERROR_LIFETIME + ?
WHERE METADATA_ID IS NULL AND SERVER_ID = ?

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} SET RECEIVED = RECEIVED + ?, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ?, FILTERED = FILTERED + ?, FILTERED_LIFETIME = FILTERED_LIFETIME + ?, SENT = SENT + ?, SENT_LIFETIME = SENT_LIFETIME + ?, ERROR = ERROR + ?, ERROR_LIFETIME = ERROR_LIFETIME + ?
WHERE METADATA_ID = ? AND SERVER_ID = ?

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} SET RECEIVED = 0, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = 0, FILTERED = 0, FILTERED_LIFETIME = 0, SENT = 0, SENT_LIFETIME = 0, ERROR = 0, ERROR_LIFETIME = 0
WHERE SERVER_ID = ?
TRUNCATE test_table
INSERT INTO test_table (id, string) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, IS_ENCRYPTED FROM D_MC${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND METADATA_ID = ?
SELECT CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, IS_ENCRYPTED FROM D_MC${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND METADATA_ID = 0 AND CONTENT_TYPE IN (4, 15)
SELECT * FROM D_MCM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND METADATA_ID = ?
INSERT INTO D_CHANNELS (CHANNEL_ID, LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID) VALUES (?, ?)
INSERT INTO D_MCM${localChannelId} (METADATA_ID, MESSAGE_ID, ${metaDataColumnNames}) VALUES (?, ?, ${metaDataColumnPlaceholders})
UPDATE D_MCM${localChannelId} SET ${metaDataColumnPlaceholders} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND METADATA_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID
SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND ID IN (${metaDataIds}) ORDER BY CHAIN_ID ASC, ORDER_ID ASC
DELETE FROM D_M${localChannelId} WHERE ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MC${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MC${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ? AND METADATA_ID = ? AND CONTENT_TYPE = ?
DELETE FROM D_MA${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_M${localChannelId}
